subject: SCP-173
description: Containment breach during routine maintenance. Subject terminated 2 personnel before recontainment. Security protocols updated.

subject: SCP-682
description: SCP-682 adapted to acid containment, requiring emergency protocol Zeta-9. Subject neutralized after 6 hours. Casualty count: 12.

subject: SCP-096
description: Subject's face accidentally photographed by surveillance system. Affected personnel neutralized before full breach. Camera systems updated.

subject: SCP-106
description: SCP-106 escaped containment through corroded wall section. Lure protocol initiated successfully. 4 personnel MIA, presumed deceased.
